Package Part1

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Box
    Box class which inherits from Package and implements testWeight() and computeCost()
    CargoTest
    CargoTest class which tests the methods of the Truck and Package classes
    Letter
    Letter class which inherits from Package and implements testWeight() and computeCost()
    MetalCrate
    Letter class which inherits from Package and implements testWeight() and computeCost()
    Package
    This is the abstract class for Letter, Box, WoodCrate and MetalCrate
    Truck
    This is the Truck class file which encapsulates informations regarding the cargo for packages
    TruckPackageDriver
    TruckPackageDriver class which prompts a menu for user to manipulate a cargo truck and its packages.
    WoodCrate
    WoodCrate class which inherits from Package and implements testWeight() and computeCost()
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PackageException
    PackageException class which handles the exception messages (e.g.: weight limit reached / invalid tracking nb / truck full)
